Name: PartyHotbar
Author: Loskh
Punchline: Add a hotkey bar next to each member on one side of the PartyList Hud.
Description:
Add a hotkey bar next to each member on one side of the PartyList Hud to facilitate quick skill casting on members.
Each hotkey bar can have a maximum of 4 buttons.
A re-login is required to enable this feature.
